text.div:
This code system http://mitwfhir.dicom.org.tw/fhir/CodeSystem/NASH-Periportal-Bridging-Necrosis defines the following codes:

CodeDisplay
0 none
1 mild piecemeal necrosis
3 moderate piecemeal necrosis (<50% circumference of most portal tracts)
4 marked piecemeal necrosis (>50% circumference of most portal tracts)
5 moderate piecemeal necrosis plus bridging necrosis
6 marked piecemeal necrosis plus bridging necrosis
10 multilobular necrosis

concept.display: moderate piecemeal necrosis (<50% circumference of most portal tracts)
marked piecemeal necrosis (>50% circumference of most portal tracts)
moderate piecemeal necrosis plus bridging necrosis
marked piecemeal necrosis plus bridging necrosis
